subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Nick Nuyens of Belgium won the Tour of Flanders classic in Meerbeke, Belgium, beating Sylvain Chavanel of France and Fabian Cancellara of Switzerland, the 2010 winner, in a three-way sprint to the finish line.
snippet: Nick Nuyens of Belgium won the Tour of Flanders classic in Meerbeke, Belgium, beating Sylvain Chavanel of France and Fabian Cancellara of Switzerland, the 2010 winner, in a three-way sprint to the finish line.
